response.original_title: Wave Warriors IV: On The Loose
response.overview: Herbie Fletcher's legendary 1989 surf film featuring solid power surfing shot during the epic 1988/89 North Shore season in Hawaii, Bali, and California.  This fourth installment of the iconic Wave Warriors series showcases an incredible all-star lineup including a young Kelly Slater, Tom Curren, Martin Potter, Tom Carroll, Matt Archbold, Sunny Garcia, Christian Fletcher, and Hawaiian legends Johnny Boy Gomes, Dane Kealoha, Derek Ho, Michael Ho, Wes Laine, and many more. - https://nalu.tv/collections/surfing-films/products/wave-warriors-4-stream
response.title: Wave Warriors IV: On The Loose
